info.author: Daxeel Soni
info.description:
edumath is a python module. You can do calculations of advance topics of mathematics of high school. In intial release v 1.0 it contains 28 functions for performing calculations.

What are the fuctions included?
===============================
For matrix operations
---------------------
det_2c2()
det_3c3()
trans_2c2()
trans_3c3()
adj_2c2()
adj_3c3()
inv_2c2()
inv_3c3()
add_2c2()
add_3c3()
sub_2c2()
sub_3c3()

For progression operations
---------------------------
ap_term()
gp_term()
hp_term()
ap_sum()
gp_sum()

For vector operations
---------------------
mag()
dot()
cross()
box()
triple()
angle()
angx()
angy()
angz()
coplan()
ortho()

For more information, making contribution and documentation visit
https://github.com/daxeel/edumath
info.name: edumath
info.html_description:
edumath is a python module. You can do calculations of advance topics of mathematics of high school. In intial release v 1.0 it contains 28 functions for performing calculations.

What are the fuctions included?

For matrix operations

det_2c2() det_3c3() trans_2c2() trans_3c3() adj_2c2() adj_3c3() inv_2c2() inv_3c3() add_2c2() add_3c3() sub_2c2() sub_3c3()

For progression operations

ap_term() gp_term() hp_term() ap_sum() gp_sum()

For vector operations

mag() dot() cross() box() triple() angle() angx() angy() angz() coplan() ortho()

For more information, making contribution and documentation visit https://github.com/daxeel/edumath
